FuncDef:
The email command configures an email address for a PKI entity.
The undo email command cancels the configuration. The email command configures an email address for a PKI entity. The undo email command cancels the configuration. By default, no email address is configured for a PKI entity.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the email address of a PKI entity.
The value is a string of 1 to 128 case-sensitive characters, including letters, numerals, apostrophes ('), equal signs (=), parentheses (), plus signs (+), minus signs (-), periods (.), slashes (/), colons (:), at signs (@), underscores (_), and spaces.
